author: Marius Farashi Tasooji
title: Google Play bannit les wallet crypto avant de faire marche arriÃ¨re : La self-custody encore inquiÃ©tÃ©e
text:
Google interdit les wallet crypto non-custodial avant de faire marche arriÃ¨re Hier, 13 aoÃ»t 2025, Google Play Store a annoncÃ© une nouvelle politique imposant aux dÃ©veloppeurs de portefeuilles crypto dâ€™obtenir une licence rÃ©glementaire pour publier leurs applications .
Cette modification devait concerner 15 juridictions, dont les Ã‰tats-Unis et lâ€™Union europÃ©enne, et ne comptait aucune distinction entre portefeuilles custodial et non-custodial .
Quelle est la diffÃ©rence entre un portefeuille custodial et non-custodial? Un portefeuille non-custodial donne Ã  lâ€™utilisateur le contrÃ´le total de ses clÃ©s privÃ©es et donc de ses fonds. Un portefeuille custodial, lui, confie ces clÃ©s Ã  un tiers qui gÃ¨re la garde des actifs. Dans le 1er cas, vous Ãªtes votre propre banque, dans le 2e, dÃ©pendant dâ€™un intermÃ©diaire. ðŸ‘› DÃ©couvrez notre top 10 des meilleurs wallets pour sÃ©curiser vos Bitcoins
Aux Ã‰tats-Unis, Google demandait lâ€™enregistrement auprÃ¨s du FinCEN en tant que Money Service Business ou un statut bancaire . Ces obligations impliquent la mise en place de procÃ©dures strictes de lutte contre le blanchiment (AML), de lutte contre le financement du terrorisme (CTF) et de vÃ©rification dâ€™identitÃ© (KYC), obligations qui ne sâ€™appliquent normalement pas aux portefeuilles non-custodial.
Dans lâ€™Union europÃ©enne, la politique imposait lâ€™obtention dâ€™une licence MiCA en tant que prestataire de services sur actifs numÃ©riques. Or, ce statut est rÃ©servÃ© aux entitÃ©s qui gÃ¨rent ou conservent des actifs pour leurs clients.
Lâ€™application stricte de cette rÃ¨gle aurait pu empÃªcher la plupart de ces portefeuilles dâ€™Ãªtre proposÃ©s sur le Play Store .
Fructifiez votre capital en 15 minutes par jour grÃ¢ce aux analyses et stratÃ©gies de nos experts PublicitÃ© Bitcoin et les cryptomonnaies survivent Ã  cette attaque, pour l'instant Cette mise Ã  jour des obligations imposÃ©es par Google Play semblait sâ€™aligner sur les recommandations du Groupe dâ€™action financiÃ¨re (GAFI) , qui cherche Ã  Ã©tendre les rÃ¨gles aux applications non-custodial dÃ¨s quâ€™un contrÃ´le mÃªme partiel sur les fonds ou lâ€™interface utilisateur est identifiÃ©.
Sous la pression des critiques, Google a finalement fait marche arriÃ¨re et clarifiÃ© que sa politique ne concernait pas les portefeuilles non-custodial , mettant fin Ã  la crainte immÃ©diate dâ€™une exclusion de ces solutions.
Thanks for flagging this. Non-custodial wallets are not in scope of Google Playâ€™s Cryptocurrency Exchanges and Software Wallets Policy. We are updating the Help Center to make this clear.
â€” News from Google (@NewsFromGoogle) August 13, 2025
Cet Ã©vÃ©nement survient seulement 1 semaine aprÃ¨s que Roman Storm, dÃ©veloppeur de Tornado Cash, un mixeur destinÃ© Ã  offrir de la confidentialitÃ© aux utilisateurs de cryptomonnaies, a Ã©tÃ© reconnu coupable dâ€™exploitation non autorisÃ©e dâ€™un service de transmission dâ€™argent, alors mÃªme que son application Ã©tait un service self-custodiale.
ðŸ“° Ã€ lire Ã©galement dans l'actualitÃ© â€“ 124 000 dollars : le BTC rÃ©alise un nouveau plus haut historique
Bien que plusieurs Ã‰tats amÃ©ricains reconnaissent dÃ©sormais la self-custody comme un droit, rien ne garantit que lâ€™Europe et les autres pays adopteront la mÃªme position. Incapables dâ€™attaquer directement Bitcoin, ses dÃ©tracteurs pourraient cibler les applications et services qui en facilitent lâ€™usage autonome, ainsi que leurs dÃ©veloppeurs .
Cette stratÃ©gie, plus accessible pour les Ã‰tats sur le plan juridique, pourrait devenir lâ€™un des fronts majeurs de la bataille rÃ©glementaire autour de Bitcoin dans les prochaines annÃ©es.
Ledger : la meilleure solution pour protÃ©ger vos cryptomonnaies ðŸ”’ PublicitÃ© - Investir comporte des risques ( en savoir plus )

author: Ramishah Maruf, CNN
title: Walmart recalls magnetic balls after CPSC warns of choking and injury hazards | Consumer Watch | wsiltv.com
text:
New York (CNN) â€” Regulators have issued a recall for high-powered magnetic balls after the US Consumer Product Safety Commission issued several warnings for the toy kits, citing the risk of injury or even death.
Walmart recalled the â€œRelax 5mm Science Kit, Large Hematite Magnets Magnetic Stones Building Blocks,â€ sold exclusively on the site through Joybuy.
Earlier in December, CPSC said these magnets, often marketed for children, are small enough to fit into the CPSCâ€™s small parts cylinder (which simulates the width of a childâ€™s throat), and are also magnetically stronger than permitted. If swallowed, the high-powered magnets can attract to each other or to other metals inside the digestive system, leading to â€œperforations, twisting and/or blockage of the intestines, infection, blood poisoning and death.â€
The agency broadly estimated 2,500 emergency room visits over magnet ingestions from 2017-2021 and seven deaths, two of which were outside of the United States.
The recall affects about 4,240 units. The CPSC said customers should take away the balls from children immediately and contact Joybuy for a pre-paid label to return the recalled products for a full refund. The toy kit was sold from February 2022 through April 2023 for between $14 and $15 and is made of small magnetic balls in purple, black, green, blue, orange and red.
The-CNN-Wire

author: SBT
title: Transtorno de ansiedade em animais explodiu apÃ³s pandemia; saiba o que fazer
text: Transtorno de ansiedade em animais explodiu apÃ³s pandemia; saiba o que fazer SBT News conversou com um comportamentalista animal, que explicou os sintomas e aÃ§Ãµes que os tutores podem tomar para ajudar o pet O transtorno de ansiedade nÃ£o afeta apenas seres humanos. Animais tambÃ©m podem sofrer com condiÃ§Ãµes semelhantes, manifestando-se de formas muitas vezes preocupantes. Um exemplo recente e que viralizou na internet Ã© o caso do gato Thor, um felino de sete anos que causou graves ferimentos em sua tutora, Luciana Nascimento, de 49 anos, durante um episÃ³dio de comportamento agressivo. Em entrevista ao G1, Luciana revelou que o comportamento agressivo do felino comeÃ§ou ainda na fase de filhote e, apesar dos esforÃ§os da famÃ­lia para acalmÃ¡-lo, eles se veem sem alternativas, pois nÃ£o pretendem se desfazer do animal e os especialistas consultados jÃ¡ chegaram atÃ© mesmo a sugerir eutanÃ¡sia. O SBT News conversou com Wagner BrandÃ£o, comportamentalista animal, que explicou as possÃ­veis causas que levam os animais a terem transtorno de ansiedade e algumas atitudes que podem ajudar com o problema. Segundo BrandÃ£o, sÃ£o vÃ¡rios os motivos que podem causar estresse nos animais: mudanÃ§as na rotina, muito barulho, a chegada de um novo pet e ansiedade de separaÃ§Ã£o â€” a mais comum de acordo com o especialista. "Muita gente usa o termo sÃ­ndrome da ansiedade de separaÃ§Ã£o, mas estÃ¡ errado. NÃ£o Ã© um problema genÃ©tico, Ã© um problema na rotina da casa do animal e acontece tanto em gatos quanto em cÃ£es. Houve um boom apÃ³s a pandemia, mas sempre existiu", diz. O comportamentalista de animais dÃ¡ um exemplo bastante comum que pode causar esse tipo de reaÃ§Ã£o no animal: aquela festinha sempre que chegamos em casa. Segundo o especialista, ao fazer isso, estamos adestrando os pets que aquele horÃ¡rio Ã© o momento de recreio com o tutor. E, segundo BrandÃ£o, os animais sÃ£o rotineiros, qualquer atraso, pode se tornar um motivo de ansiedade para eles. "Vamos supor que o tutor, que sempre chega Ã s 17h, sÃ³ chega Ã s 20h, o animal vai ficar estressado. Cinco horas da tarde Ã© o pico de ansiedade do animal, porque Ã© o horÃ¡rio que a tutora ensinou como horÃ¡rio do recreio com ela", explica e continua: "E o que Ã© o estresse animal? Falando de forma comportamental, Ã© a destruiÃ§Ã£o em massa, o xixi no lugar errado, comer batente de porta, pegar roupa no varal, qualquer comportamento errÃ¡tico para chamar atenÃ§Ã£o do tutor que estÃ¡ atrasado" "Mas tem o lado veterinÃ¡rio tambÃ©m. Uma pessoa estressada geralmente apresenta problemas de saÃºde, nÃ£o Ã©? O animal tambÃ©m, eles podem ter inflamaÃ§Ã£o na bexiga, conhecida como SÃ­ndrome de Pandora, problema de pele, pressÃ£o alta, diabetes e por aÃ­ vai", pontua. O que fazer? BrandÃ£o explica que em casos de ansiedade por separaÃ§Ã£o, o adestramento Ã© a melhor soluÃ§Ã£o, e pode comeÃ§ar com uma mudanÃ§a de comportamento simples dos tutores. Isso mesmo. Ao chegar em casa, os tutores devem ignorar os animais e resistir a tÃ­pica e irresistÃ­vel cara de dÃ³. "Ao chegar em casa, beba sua Ã¡gua, guarde sua bolsa, vÃ¡ no banheiro, converse com o seu companheiro, faÃ§a o que tem que fazer, atÃ© que eles deixem de prestar atenÃ§Ã£o e parem de cobrar atenÃ§Ã£o de vocÃª", afirma BrandÃ£o. "Quando eles nÃ£o estiverem cobrando atenÃ§Ã£o, Ã© a hora que vocÃª pode dar atenÃ§Ã£o para eles. O que significa isso? Que o dominante do bando, que sÃ£o todas as pessoas da casa menos os animais, estÃ¡ agradando eles (os pets) quando quer, nÃ£o porque chegou na casa e tem essa obrigaÃ§Ã£o", continua. "EntÃ£o eles vÃ£o comeÃ§ar a entender que os lÃ­deres do bando estÃ£o fazendo carinho a hora que eles querem e nÃ£o porque eles chegaram, com isso o animal nÃ£o vai ficar mais ansioso pela chegada dos tutores. Isso vai comeÃ§ar a tirar essa ansiedade de separaÃ§Ã£o", pontua. "A ansiedade de separaÃ§Ã£o Ã© uma das principais causas hoje em dia, pÃ³s-pandemia, de problemas de saÃºde em animais, principalmente em cÃ£es e gatos", completa

author: Rachel Metz
title: OpenAI lanza el modelo GPT-4.5: busca mejorar la escritura y la codificaciÃ³n
text:
Bloomberg â€” OpenAI estÃ¡ lanzando una versiÃ³n preliminar de un nuevo modelo de inteligencia artificial largamente esperado llamado GPT-4.5 despuÃ©s de encontrar obstÃ¡culos en el desarrollo del sistema de IA el aÃ±o pasado.
En una publicaciÃ³n de blog el jueves, la startup de IA con sede en San Francisco dijo que GPT-4.5 es mejor para captar y responder a seÃ±ales sutiles de las indicaciones escritas de los usuarios y es particularmente hÃ¡bil para chatear, escribir y codificar. OpenAI tambiÃ©n espera que el nuevo modelo invente cosas con menos frecuencia que su software anterior.
En un primer momento, OpenAI ofrece el modelo como una â€œvista previa de investigaciÃ³nâ€ a un grupo limitado de desarrolladores de software y usuarios que pagan US$$200 al mes por una suscripciÃ³n a ChatGPT Pro. La compaÃ±Ã­a planea incorporar los comentarios de las primeras personas que lo prueben antes de implementarlo para un pÃºblico mÃ¡s amplio.
OpenAI iniciÃ³ un frenesÃ­ en torno a la IA generativa a fines de 2022 con el lanzamiento de ChatGPT, que originalmente estaba impulsado por un modelo anterior llamado GPT-3.5. Desde entonces, la empresa ha lanzado una serie de sistemas cada vez mÃ¡s sofisticados, incluidas mÃºltiples opciones que imitan el proceso de razonamiento humano. Pero OpenAI tambiÃ©n se enfrenta a una mayor competencia de la emergente china DeepSeek, xAI de Elon Musk y Anthropic, cada una de las cuales ha presentado nuevos modelos en las Ãºltimas semanas.
Nick Ryder, vicepresidente de investigaciÃ³n de OpenAI, dijo a Bloomberg News que espera que GPT-4.5 represente un salto tan grande en capacidades desde su modelo GPT de gama alta existente como el que la empresa vio desde GPT-3.5 hasta GPT-4, que saliÃ³ a principios de 2023.
Lea mÃ¡s: OpenAI prohÃ­be cuentas que aparentemente trabajaban para una herramienta de vigilancia china
Sin embargo, construirlo resultÃ³ ser un desafÃ­o. El modelo, al que se hace referencia como Orion dentro de la empresa, no alcanzÃ³ los puntos de referencia de rendimiento deseados por OpenAI el aÃ±o pasado, informÃ³ anteriormente Bloomberg News. A fines del verano, por ejemplo, Orion se quedÃ³ corto al intentar responder preguntas de codificaciÃ³n para las que no habÃ­a sido entrenado, segÃºn personas familiarizadas con el asunto. Un problema al que se enfrentaron OpenAI y otros desarrolladores fue encontrar nuevas fuentes de datos de entrenamiento de alta calidad que no habÃ­an sido explotadas para desarrollar sistemas de IA mÃ¡s avanzados.
OpenAI se basÃ³ en un proceso llamado post-entrenamiento, durante el cual incorpora comentarios humanos para mejorar las respuestas y refinar el tono de cÃ³mo el modelo debe interactuar con los usuarios, entre otras cosas. La empresa tambiÃ©n ideÃ³ nuevas formas de entrenar el modelo utilizando datos derivados de la informaciÃ³n utilizada para entrenar su modelo GPT-4.0 existente, dijo Mia Glaese, tambiÃ©n vicepresidenta de investigaciÃ³n de la empresa.
El lanzamiento de GPT-4.5 marcarÃ¡ el fin de una era para OpenAI. En una publicaciÃ³n en X a principios de este mes, el director ejecutivo de OpenAI, Sam Altman, dijo que el modelo serÃ­a el Ãºltimo que la empresa presentarÃ­a que no utiliza potencia informÃ¡tica adicional para reflexionar sobre las consultas antes de responder. OpenAI ha adoptado este enfoque de razonamiento con algunos de sus modelos mÃ¡s nuevos, incluidos o1 y o3.
En el futuro, OpenAI avanzarÃ¡ para combinar sus modelos GPT con su nueva serie de modelos o para construir sistemas de IA que puedan determinar automÃ¡ticamente cuÃ¡nto tiempo deben reflexionar sobre una consulta antes de dar una respuesta. El objetivo, dijo Altman, es simplificar la experiencia para que los usuarios no se vean obligados a elegir entre una lista de opciones cada vez mÃ¡s complicada.
Lea mÃ¡s en Bloomberg.com

text:
Movimento â€œVamos ajudar o Alexâ€ vai recolher medula Ã³ssea no concelho de Arganil nos dias 16 e 21 de Novembro 7 de Novembro de 2024 Ãšltimas Leave a comment 21 VisualizaÃ§Ãµes

Os promotores do movimento â€œVamos ajudar o Alexâ€ vai promover duas acÃ§Ãµes de recolha de medula Ã³ssea em CÃ´ja ( Gimnodesportivo da Casa do Povo de CÃ´ja, entre as 9 e as 13h00 do dia 16 de Novembro) e na CerÃ¢mica Arganilense (21 de Novembro, das 9h30 Ã s 13h00 e das 14h30 Ã s 18h30). Alex PaixÃ£o, um jovem de 21 anos, residente em Alagoa, no concelho de Arganil, foi, recorde-se, diagnosticado, em Agosto deste ano, com leucemia e necessita de um transplante de medula Ã³ssea. A mÃ£e, familiares e amigos, estÃ£o a promover uma campanha â€œVamos ajudar o Alexâ€ para encontrar um dador compatÃ­vel.
A doenÃ§a chama-se leucemia linfoblÃ¡stica Aguda Tipo T e Ã© o primeiro caso aparecer nos Hospitais da Universidade de Coimbra (HUC).
Alex, que estudava treino desportivo na Escola Superior de Desporto de Rio Maior, estÃ¡ a realizar, quimioterapia, de trÃªs em trÃªs semanas, nos HUC. A mÃ£e estÃ¡ a apelar a todas as pessoas para que se registem como dadores e se desloquem a um Centro de Sangue e TransplantaÃ§Ã£o ou que se dirijam a uma brigada mÃ³vel do Instituto do PortuguÃªs do Sangue e TransplantaÃ§Ã£o (IPST).

author: PA News Agency
title: Tory MP suggests â€˜crap parentsâ€™ behind most of townâ€™s struggling children | Norwich Evening News
text: A Conservative MP has been criticised for suggesting most children who struggle in an English town are the â€œproducts of crap parentsâ€. James Daly was accused by his Labour rival of â€œinsulting the parenting skills of people in Buryâ€ after the remark was made in a newspaper piece analysing election prospects for the Greater Manchester town. Mr Daly, speaking to the i newspaper, stressed the importance of â€œstabilityâ€ offered by the family unit as he outlined what the New Conservatives group of MPs stands for. The Bury North MP said: â€œI think New Conservatives represent very much working-class conservatism. â€œWeâ€™re not a strange right-wing sect. Itâ€™s just people who want to give people the best chance to succeed and thrive in life. â€œWhen you think about the family, itâ€™s about stability. â€œMost of the kids who struggle in Bury are the products of crap parents and so what do we do to try to address that issue? â€œOn the left it would just be weâ€™ll throw money at this and hope something sticks, somebody like me thinks about this more fundamentally.â€ James Frith, Labourâ€™s prospective parliamentary candidate for Bury North, said: â€œIt is revealing to see how little James Daly thinks of his own constituents. â€œRather than insulting the parenting skills of people in Bury, he should look closer to home. â€œOver the last 13 years the Conservatives have failed to grow our economy, protect our public services or provide opportunities for young people in Bury and across the UK.â€

author: Jordan Green
title: How to keep pipes from freezing: Tips, ideas to keep water flowing
text: How do I keep my pipes from freezing? Tips to keep water going during sub-zero temperatures [Jordan Green](https://www.commercialappeal.com/staff/12264441002/jordan-green/) Protecting homes from icy temperatures is the goal for many Tennesseans this coming week as [subzero wind chills head our direction](/story/weather/2024/01/09/winter-storm-preparedness-in-tn-what-to-do-before-freezing-weather/72164770007/). Rather than spending thousands of dollars to try and fix pipes that might burst in your home next week, just take a few minutes to go through a checklist for home safety. Your kitchen may look silly with random cabinets open under the sink, but it will be worth it to not have to possibly replace any pipes after the freeze. Here are ways to keep your pipes from freezing during the chilly temperatures next week. How do I keep my pipes from freezing? Tips to keep water flowing It is recommended by [State Farm](https://www.statefarm.com/simple-insights/residence/dont-let-pipes-freeze-and-steps-to-take-if-they-do#:~:text=A%20trickle%20of%20water%20might,may%20help%20prevent%20frozen%20pipes.) to take time to make sure pipes don't freeze by following these steps: - Insulate pipes - Use heat tape or heat cables - Seal leaks in the home via windows or cracks - Secure outdoor faucets by draining and taking in hoses and sprinklers - Let both hot and cold water drip indoors to keep water flowing - Adjust the thermostat to stay warm overnight - Open cabinet doors to let air hit indoor pipes - Keep the garage door closed if exposed pipes are inside it What home temperature keeps pipes from freezing? Homes should be kept at a minimum of 55 degrees to keep pipes from freezing. This is the recommended temperature for people who are out of town. At what temperature do pipes freeze? Technically pipes can freeze in 32-degree weather, but most will not freeze until under 20 degrees. The longer the temperature remains under 20, the greater the chance of freezing. Pipes can fully freeze within six hours if the temperatures are cold enough. What pipes are most likely to freeze? Pipes that are not insulted and in open, unheated spaces are the most likely to freeze. These can be pipes in attics, basements or garages. As there is no warm air flowing to these pipes and they are exposed, they are at a greater risk. What to do if pipes freeze? State Farm also recommends taking these steps if your pipes do end up freezing because of the near-zero temperatures: - Shut off the water supply - Open faucets - Use a hair dryer or a space heater to warm pipes - Turn up the heat in the house - Do not use an open flame to warm pipes - Do not pour hot water down the drain to warm pipes - Call a plumber if needed

author: VNExplorer
title: BHEL shares jump 6%, top Rs 200 level on Rs 19,422 crore order win report
text:
BHEL shares jump 6%, top Rs 200 level on Rs 19,422 crore order win report
Shares of Bharat Heavy Electricals Ltd (BHEL) climbed 5 per cent in Mondayâ€™s trade amid a media report, which quoting sources suggested that the PSU has emerged as the best bidder for a Rs 19,422-crore turnkey contract for building a thermal power plant for NLC India at Talabira, Odisha. A highly placed official told The Hindu businessline that BHEL quoted a better price than L&T-MHI, adding that the financial bids were opened on Friday. There was no such filing on stock exchanges either by BHEL or NLC India so far.
Following the development, BHEL shares climbed 5.78 per cent to hit a high of Rs 204.65 on BSE. At 9.25 am, shares of NLC India were up 1.56 per cent at R 257.30. Shares of Larsen & Toubro Ltd (L&T) were flat at Rs 3,525.05.
BHEL, as per the report, would build three ultra supercritical units of 800 MW each for NLC India at Talabira. The EPC tender was for the first three projects, the report said, adding that it was not clear whether or not there would be a separate tender for the fourth unit.
This is a big order for BHEL, which will load its plants at Haridwar (turbine-generator), Tiruchi (boilers) and Hyderabad (various other components such as pulveriser mills), the report suggested.
The power plant would be fed with coal from NLCâ€™s Talabira mines. NLC will produce 14.5 million tonnes of coal from Talabira this year, but has plans to raise production to 20 million tonnes in a few years, as per the report.
A job of this size will take about five years to complete, experts in the field, said the report. The project was first designed to be put up at Sirkazhi in Tamil Nadu. It however was shifted to Talabira later in order to save the transporting coal cost from Talabira mines to down south.
As of September 30, NLC India had 3.6 GW of thermal power capacity and 1.4 GW of renewable energy and mining capacity of 50 million tonnes of lignite and coal, The Hindu businessline reported. As per the businessline report, the company has won two solar projects through competitive bidding processes â€” 600 MW in Gujarat and 800 MW in Rajasthan. The company has plans to increase electricity generation capacity to 17 GW by 2030.

author: Fotis Yanchev
title: Wireguard not able to connect any peer - General Support - Unraid
text:
Hello, have the Unraid installation for an year - did all the setup back then, but suddenly Wireguard stopped working (was using it to access remotely the shares from my remote windows location)
Just checking the docker apps:
- Swag - is working no error
- CloudflaredTunnel - have a custom domain - remotely I can access the dashboard through my domain
- DuckDns - is ok, handling the IP changes - requested static IP from ISP, should be available later today or tomorrow.
Wireguard tunnel -- where should it point for local endpoint - local IP of server, custom domain or duckdns address. Read that its good to use Remote tunneled access (have no idea and could not find peer type access explained, so to be able to choose the correct one in different scenarios)
I have a router from ISP with 192.168.1.1 mask and my router after the ISP with 192.168.0.1 which gives a dedicated address for the server. Have created a UDP port forward from 192.168.1.1:51820 to 192.168.0.1:51820 I think its correct. Done same for swag, plex and other services.
Whatever I do create a peer add it to my phone via file or QR -core, turn it on, it shows green but not able to connect to shares as before and Date received Data send stays at 0.
I really do not if the issue is directly with Wireguard setup, or it conflicts with the other docker containers somehow. Would appreciate any help or advice.
Thank you in advance for your time and efforts.
